    #### LAND TRAINING TECHS ####

### Minimal training = -10% stats
### Basic Training = no change
### Advanced Training = +5% stats
### Specialist Training = +10% stats

specialist_training_air_tech = {
	allow = {
		or = {
			and = {
				specialist_training_air_tech = 1
				not = { specialist_training_air_tech = 2 }
			}
			and = {
				specialist_training_air_tech = 2
				not = { specialist_training_air_tech = 3 }
			}
			and = {
				specialist_training_air_tech = 3
				not = { specialist_training_air_tech = 4 }
			}
			and = {
				specialist_training_air_tech = 4
				not = { specialist_training_air_tech = 5 }
			}
			and = {
				specialist_training_air_tech = 5
				not = { specialist_training_air_tech = 6 }
			}
			and = {
				specialist_training_air_tech = 6
				not = { specialist_training_air_tech = 7 }
			}
			and = {
				specialist_training_air_tech = 7
				not = { specialist_training_air_tech = 8 }
			}
			and = {
				specialist_training_air_tech = 8
				not = { specialist_training_air_tech = 9 }
			}
			and = {
				specialist_training_air_tech = 9
				not = { specialist_training_air_tech = 10 }
			}
			and = {
				specialist_training_air_tech = 10
				not = { specialist_training_air_tech = 11 }
			}
			and = {
				specialist_training_air_tech = 11
				not = { specialist_training_air_tech = 12 }
			}
			and = {

				not = { minimal_training_naval_tech = 79 }
			}
			and = {
				minimal_training_naval_tech = 79
				not = { minimal_training_naval_tech = 80 }
			}
			and = {
				minimal_training_naval_tech = 80
				not = { minimal_training_naval_tech = 81 }
			}
			and = {

				not = { minimal_training_naval_tech = 82 }
			}
			and = {
				minimal_training_naval_tech = 82
				not = { minimal_training_naval_tech = 83 }
			}
			and = {

				not = { minimal_training_naval_tech = 84 }
			}
			and = {

				not = { minimal_training_naval_tech = 85 }
			}

				not = { minimal_training_naval_tech = 86 }
			}

				not = { minimal_training_naval_tech = 87 }
			}

				not = { minimal_training_naval_tech = 88 }

				not = { minimal_training_naval_tech = 89 }

minimal_training_naval_tech_revert = {
	allow = {

basic_training_naval_tech_revert = {
	allow = {
		or = {
			and = {
				basic_training_naval_tech_revert = 1
				not = { basic_training_naval_tech_revert = 2 }
			}
			and = {
				basic_training_naval_tech_revert = 2
				not = { basic_training_naval_tech_revert = 3 }
			}
			and = {
				basic_training_naval_tech_revert = 3
				not = { basic_training_naval_tech_revert = 4 }
			}
			and = {
				basic_training_naval_tech_revert = 4
				not = { basic_training_naval_tech_revert = 5 }

				advanced_training_naval_tech = 84
				not = { advanced_training_naval_tech = 85 }
			}
			and = {
				advanced_training_naval_tech = 85
				not = { advanced_training_naval_tech = 86 }
			}
			and = {
				advanced_training_naval_tech = 86
				not = { advanced_training_naval_tech = 87 }
			}
			and = {

				not = { advanced_training_naval_tech = 88 }
			}

				not = { advanced_training_naval_tech = 89 }
			}
			and = {

				not = { advanced_training_naval_tech = 90 }
			}

advanced_training_naval_tech_revert = {
	allow = {
		or = {
			and = {
				advanced_training_naval_tech_revert = 1
				not = { advanced_training_naval_tech_revert = 2 }
			}
			and = {
				advanced_training_naval_tech_revert = 2
				not = { advanced_training_naval_tech_revert = 3 }
			}
			and = {
				advanced_training_naval_tech_revert = 3
				not = { advanced_training_naval_tech_revert = 4 }
			}
			and = {
				advanced_training_naval_tech_revert = 4
				not = { advanced_training_naval_tech_revert = 5 }
			}
			and = {

				not = { advanced_training_naval_tech_revert = 6 }

			}

				not = { advanced_training_naval_tech_revert = 8 }
			}
			and = {

	motorized_engineer_brigade = {		### 50% cost/time here 50% small arms
		build_cost_ic = 0.091
		build_time = -1.45
	}
	ss_motorized_engineer_brigade = {	### 50% cost/time here 50% small arms
		build_cost_ic = 0.107
		build_time = -1.45
	}


	difficulty = 1

	start_year = 1900
	first_offset = 1901
	additional_offset = 1
	max_level = 200
	##folder = industry_folder
	change = no
	stealable = no
	can_upgrade = no
}

mustang_tech = {
	allow = {
        aeroengine = 7
        has_country_flag = mustang_tech_active
    }

    interceptor = {
        range = 400
    }
    multi_role = {
        range = 400
    }

	research_bonus_from = {
		aeronautic_engineering = 0.2
		single_engine_aircraft_practical = 0.2
	}

	on_completion = aeronautic_engineering

	difficulty = 3

	start_year = 1943
	folder = unit_training_folder
	change = no
	stealable = no
	can_upgrade = yes
}

        has_country_flag = ppsh_41_pps_43_tech_active

        year = 1941
    }

		toughness = 0.7
		defensiveness = 0.8
		soft_attack = 1.7
        urban = {
            attack = 0.1
            defence = 0.1
        }
	}
	infantry_bat = {
		toughness = 0.7
		defensiveness = 0.75
		soft_attack = 0.8
        urban = {
            attack = 0.1
            defence = 0.1
        }
	}

		toughness = 0.75
		defensiveness = 0.85
		soft_attack = 1.7
        urban = {
            attack = 0.1
            defence = 0.1
        }
	}

		toughness = 0.9
		defensiveness = 1
		soft_attack = 2
        urban = {
            attack = 0.1
            defence = 0.1
        }
	}
	motorized_infantry_bat = {
		toughness = 0.75
		defensiveness = 0.8
		soft_attack = 1
        urban = {
            attack = 0.1
            defence = 0.1
        }
	}

		toughness = 1
		defensiveness = 1.25
		soft_attack = 2.8

            attack = 0.1

        }
